short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Product Management meeting transcripts. Integrated with AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Artos is an AI-powered solution designed to streamline and enhance the process of meeting transcriptions, specifically tailored for product management teams. By utilizing cutting-edge AI technology, Artos automatically transcribes meeting conversations with high accuracy, enabling teams to capture critical discussions, action points, and decisions effortlessly. Integrated with product management workflows, Artos makes it easier to search, analyze, and share transcripts, providing a seamless way to track project progress and ensure alignment across teams. With features such as keyword tagging, summary generation, and action item extraction, Artos helps product managers stay organized, making meetings more productive and actionable.
